burgers.name: The OG Burger
burgers.description: The original bun drop burger. Like the crabby patty you just cant go wrong with the OG one

burgers.name: Midnight Burger
burgers.description: No, i promise the chef didnt burn it. It's a stylistic choise. Comes with an EPA-uncertified dosage of coloring agents

burgers.name: Double Burger
burgers.description: For those in the bulking phase, or just using the bulking phase as an excuse like they've done the past 2 years

burgers.name: Double Sweet Burger
burgers.description: Double the pattys and double the amount of sweet caramelized onion, with some paprica thrown in there too

burgers.name: Double Muscle Burger
burgers.description: You got no stomache space to waste on veggies? This burger is all meat, and a LOT of sauce. You're gonna need a napkin

burgers.name: Mini Burger
burgers.description: They say size doesn't matter and so hopefully this miniature burger will still satisfyingly fill you up

burgers.name: Ham-burger
burgers.description: It makes for a great pun but our chefs hate it when customers try to order this without confusing them

burgers.name: Crispy Burger
burgers.description: With crispy bread and crispy bacon, this burger will both sound and taste delightful. That is if its not soggy when finally delivered

burgers.name: The Giga Burger
burgers.description: You're not eating this for any other reason than to make a statement, to let them know nothing less than the biggest is enough for you

fries.name: OG Fries
fries.description: The OG fries. Can't have a burger without the fries. Skinny and extra crispy with just a little tender inside

fries.name: Sweet Fries
fries.description: Thick cuts of sweet potato with the crispy skin still on it. Coated with salt and herbs
